name: ScanGuru

idea:
Imagine- you have just graduated with good grades, from a good college. You finally have your degree in hands and can't wait to go out and start earning for yourself. Everything seems nice, and you expects to land a good job wherever you go for interview. 

However, this myth gets busted when actually start looking for a job.

Why? - because you are a fresher with no experience. 

Industries are often reluctant to hire fresher's as this means spending additional time and resources on training. 

So there's a catch-22 situation here. Freshers have nowhere to go and don't know whom to approach.

They are stuck in an infinite loop of- "without job there will be no experience and without experience there is no job". 

So, what are we trying to do? - break the loop.

How?- by providing what's needed- "experience"

But experience in what?- experience on skills that industry demands for.

How are we going to do this?- by providing skill training and hands on experience through workshops, 

You choose the skill, we'll handle the rest..

But whom are we doing this for?- Bioscience undergraduates and fresher's. 

They get to decide, whether they want to join in the 2nd year/3rd year or even after graduation. As we say at BT beats "it's never too early or too late to start"
name: BTBeats

idea:
Hi, I am Komal.  

First, I would like to tell you a story about how do I come up with the idea of this venture. You can say that I am an Accidental Entrepreneur.

After lock-down as you know the unemployment rate has increased. It's hard to find a new job .So I observe that people are interested in Entrepreneurship instead of finding a new job. Whatever experience they have stated coaching, consulting, trading & catering & so on.

I decided to interview them. after that, I found out Even though they are experts in their particular niche it's not enough thing to start a new business. They are having problems.

eg. Mr. Manoj has more than ten years of experience in fitness & bodybuilding. So he decides to convert his passion into a business & start a supplement store online & gym & guiding to locals about exercise which they can do at home & stay healthy.

It was a good concept but, he doesn't have an idea about how to apply for a license to sell supplements, advertising, website building graphics, billing, shipping & so many things.

In short, if you have an idea it's not like you woke up & start it up.

So after some interviews, I note down what is the requirement of these people.

like eg:

investment Fund

Place for Business

Interior

licensing/Registrations

marketing

Website & graphics

Video & Photos

Accounting & billing.


So instead of going ten places, how about the first-time entrepreneur will get all of these services in one place at a pocket-friendly price. Because from start-up to set up is a very crucial time for every entrepreneur. They have handled multiple things & its hard to manage time.

So my Venture "Start it up" is for the First-time entrepreneur Who's having a Business idea & wants to make it real. 

Service Charges depend on the package of services.


I am Tax analyst as well as a CA article working in a small Ca firm. I am having past 7 years of experience & in direct & indirect taxation. I am passionate about digital marketing & gained a lot of knowledge about it. I also learned Photo editing, Logo design, Website, blogging, Content & copywriting.


We are a team of three. Each one of us is an expert in our own field.

Primary Team:

I am planning to connect with more professionals who is willing to join me in this venture & support new Entrepreneur.

Secondary Team: 

the Second team is paid interns Who are willing to learn practically in their particular Niche. They are working under the guidance of the Primary team. & also get certified after completion of their internship. 


Part-time team

We would like to collaborate with professionals with other states of India. these professionals can get connect with their locals & work on our project while doing their own work.
name: Start It Up
